content:

Cursor (pid 12432) CPU:608.8 MEM:238.1MB
Recommended actions: Close heavy apps and browser tabs consuming CPU/RAM. Kill stray dev servers: run x-stop or close ports 5000/5002/8000 if unused. Reduce worker load: pause scans or lower concurrency for a few minutes. Optional: restart Aurora services (x-stop then x-start) to clear stale processes.
Say 'execute remediation' to restart Aurora services now, or tell me which process/port to target.
